---
name: OWASP Top 10 for Web Apps
description: This prompt is used to identify and mitigate OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities in web applications
agent: agent
---

Please review the provided web application code for vulnerabilities listed in the OWASP Top 10 for Web Applications. Identify any instances of these vulnerabilities and remediate them by implementing best practices and secure coding techniques.

Please document all changes made, including explanations of the vulnerabilities found and the mitigation strategies employed. Ensure that the application maintains its original functionality while enhancing its security posture.
